Text: HU? does it 72,53 MiB for only 2 audio tracks ???

Yes. That's because these files are in FLAC format, which preserves perfect CD quality (as opposed to MP3 which throws away information it thinks you're less likely to hear).

See http://flac.sourceforge.net/

If you compare this to .WAV, it's just over half as big.

If that's still too big for you, try my Ogg upload. Ogg Vorbis is a format similar to MP3 but higher quality.
